name: Chef Juan
bio: Chef Juan is a Mexican chef and owner of Pujol in Mexico City, which has been named the best restaurant in Mexico and is frequently ranked among the world's top 50 restaurants. He is known for his innovative use of traditional Mexican ingredients and his commitment to sustainability.

name: Chef Maria
bio: Chef Maria is a Mexican chef and owner of Dulce Patria in Mexico City, which is known for its modern take on traditional Mexican cuisine. She is also a cookbook author and has been recognized by the Latin America's 50 Best Restaurants list.

name: Chef Miguel
bio: Chef Miguel is a Mexican chef and owner of Quintonil in Mexico City, which has been ranked among the world's top 10 restaurants. He is known for his use of local, seasonal ingredients and his commitment to sustainability.

name: Chef Micheal
bio: Chef Micheal is a Mexican chef and owner of Rosetta in Mexico City, which is known for its Italian-inspired cuisine. She is also a cookbook author and has been recognized by the Latin America's 50 Best Restaurants list.

name: Chef Roberto
bio: Chef Roberto is a Mexican chef and owner of Contramar in Mexico City and Cala in San Francisco. She is known for her use of sustainable seafood and her commitment to social justice issues.

name: Chef John
bio: Chef John is a Mexican-American chef based in Los Angeles. He is the executive chef at Casa Oaxaca, which is known for its authentic Oaxacan cuisine. Ruiz has also appeared on the Food Network's Chopped and Cutthroat Kitchen.
